resources.string: Vote to load the next one!
Your puzzle rating will not change. Note that puzzles are not a competition. Ratings help select the best puzzles for your current skill.
Find the best move for white.
Find the best move for black.

string.name: puzzleId
string.comment: %s is the ID of the puzzle, something like #a1b2c3.

resources.string: Openings you played the most in rated games

string.name: useFindInPage
string.comment:
useFindInPage
Appears on https://lichess.org/training/openings Encourages players to use the built-in browser feature (Ctrl+F on most desktop computers) to find the opening they want to practice.

resources.string: Use \"Find in page\" in the browser menu to find your favorite opening!
Use Ctrl+f to find your favorite opening!

string.name: ratingX
string.comment:
Appears on pages of individual puzzles.
%s is either: 1. The word 'hidden', if you have not completed the puzzle yet. 2. The rating of the puzzle, if you have completed it or seen the solution.

string.name: hidden
string.comment:
Puzzle rating: hidden
Appears while solving puzzles. Lichess only displays the rating of the puzzle after you have solved it or asked to see the solution.

plurals.name: playedXTimes
plurals.comment: Appears on pages of individual puzzles. %s is the number of times the puzzle has been played.

plurals.name: nbPointsBelowYourPuzzleRating
plurals.item: One point below your puzzle rating

plurals.name: nbPointsAboveYourPuzzleRating
plurals.item: One point above your puzzle rating

resources.string: Solve progressively harder puzzles and build a win streak. There is no clock, so take your time. One wrong move, and it\'s game over! But you can skip one move per session.
Skip this move to preserve your streak! Only works once per run.
Search puzzles from a player\'s games
You have no puzzles in the database, but Lichess still loves you very much. Play rapid and classical games to increase your chances of having a puzzle of yours added!
Nothing to show, go play some puzzles first!
Train these to optimize your progress!
You perform the best in these themes
